title: Sydney .NET user group: March
sessionTitle: Lessons learned: ASP.NET Core 1.0 + Docker in Production
eventShortDescription:
Containers, while not a new technology, are still the cool new thing in the Microsoft space. But as with all technologies, there are some rough edges and things to be wary of. 

In this talk we will step through some of the hard-fought lessons learned from running production ASP.NET Core 1.0 applications in Linux Containers on top of CoreCLR (.NET Core).
